name: Steampanzer
description:
Movement - WASD

Pick/drop towers - left click

Check tower status - hover with cursor

Upgrade - Right click

Your mission is to defend your base from an attack. Use your wits to find the best way possible to position the towers, and remember to loot the coins for upgrades!
